verses.verse: כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus הִרְאַ֖נִי <WH7200> shewed אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> Thus hath the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> and behold כְּל֥וּב <WH3619> unto me and behold a basket קָֽיִץ׃ <WH7019> of summer fruit

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said מָֽה־ <WH4100> What אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you רֹאֶה֙ <WH7200> what seest עָמ֔וֹס <WH5986> Amos וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> thou? And I said כְּל֣וּב <WH3619> A basket קָ֑יִץ <WH7019> of summer fruit וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> Then said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> about בָּ֤א <WH935> is come הַקֵּץ֙ <WH7093> unto me The end אֶל־ <WH413> about עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> upon my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לֹא־ <WH3808> no אוֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> I will not again ע֖וֹד <WH5750> again עֲב֥וֹר <WH5674> pass לֽוֹ׃

וְהֵילִ֜ילוּ <WH3213> shall be howlings שִׁיר֤וֹת <WH7892> And the songs הֵיכָל֙ <WH1964> of the temple בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3068> GOD רַ֣ב <WH7227> [there shall be] many הַפֶּ֔גֶר <WH6297> dead bodies בְּכָל־ <WH3605> every מָק֖וֹם <WH4725> in every place הִשְׁלִ֥יךְ <WH7993> they shall cast [them] forth הָֽס׃ <WH2013> with silence פ

שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Hear זֹ֕את <WH2063> who הַשֹּׁאֲפִ֖ים <WH7602> this O ye that swallow up אֶבְי֑וֹן <WH34> the needy וְלַשְׁבִּ֖ית <WH7673> to fail [עַנְוֵי־ כ] (עֲנִיֵּי־ <WH6035> humble אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH6041> the humble ק)

לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> Saying מָתַ֞י <WH4970> When יַעֲבֹ֤ר <WH5674> be gone הַחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> When will the new moon וְנַשְׁבִּ֣ירָה <WH7666> that we may sell שֶּׁ֔בֶר <WH7668> grain וְהַשַּׁבָּ֖ת <WH7676> and the sabbath וְנִפְתְּחָה־ <WH6605> that we may set forth בָּ֑ר <WH1250> wheat לְהַקְטִ֤ין <WH6994> small אֵיפָה֙ <WH374> making the ephah וּלְהַגְדִּ֣יל <WH1431> great שֶׁ֔קֶל <WH8255> and the shekel וּלְעַוֵּ֖ת <WH5791> and falsifying מֹאזְנֵ֥י <WH3976> the balances מִרְמָֽה׃ <WH4820> dishonest

לִקְנ֤וֹת <WH7069> That we may buy בַּכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> for silver דַּלִּ֔ים <WH1800> the poor וְאֶבְי֖וֹן <WH34> and the needy בַּעֲב֣וּר <WH5668> because of נַעֲלָ֑יִם <WH5275> for a pair of shoes וּמַפַּ֥ל <WH4651> the refuse בַּ֖ר <WH1250> corn נַשְׁבִּֽיר׃ <WH7666> [yea] and sell

נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <WH7650> hath sworn יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD בִּגְא֣וֹן <WH1347> by the excellency יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> of Jacob אִם־ <WH518> Indeed אֶשְׁכַּ֥ח <WH7911> forget לָנֶ֖צַח <WH5331> Surely I will never כָּל־ <WH3605> any מַעֲשֵׂיהֶֽם׃ <WH4639> any of their works

הַ֤עַל <WH5921> Because זֹאת֙ <WH2063> likewise לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תִרְגַּ֣ז <WH7264> tremble הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> Shall not the land וְאָבַ֖ל <WH56> for this and every one mourn כָּל־ <WH3605> and everyone יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> that dwelleth בָּ֑הּ וְעָלְתָ֤ה <WH5927> therein? and it shall rise up כָאֹר֙ <WH2975> wholly as a flood כֻּלָּ֔הּ <WH3605> and everyone וְנִגְרְשָׁ֥ה <WH1644> and it shall be cast out [וְנִשְׁקָה כ] (וְנִשְׁקְעָ֖ה <WH8257> make deep ק) כִּיא֥וֹר <WH2975> the Nile מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt ס

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <WH935> to go down הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH8121> that I will cause the sun בַּֽצָּהֳרָ֑יִם <WH6672> at noon וְהַחֲשַׁכְתִּ֥י <WH2821> and I will darken לָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the earth בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> day אֽוֹר׃ <WH216> in the clear

וְהָפַכְתִּ֨י <WH2015> And I will turn חַגֵּיכֶ֜ם <WH2282> your feasts לְאֵ֗בֶל <WH60> into mourning וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all שִֽׁירֵיכֶם֙ <WH7892> and all your songs לְקִינָ֔ה <WH7015> into lamentation וְהַעֲלֵיתִ֤י <WH5927> and I will bring up עַל־ <WH5921> on כָּל־ <WH3605> everyone's מָתְנַ֙יִם֙ <WH4975> upon all loins שָׂ֔ק <WH8242> sackcloth וְעַל־ <WH5921> on כָּל־ <WH3605> every רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> upon every head קָרְחָ֑ה <WH7144> and baldness וְשַׂמְתִּ֙יהָ֙ <WH7760> and I will make כְּאֵ֣בֶל <WH60> it as the mourning יָחִ֔יד <WH3173> of an only וְאַחֲרִיתָ֖הּ <WH319> [son] and the end כְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> day מָֽר׃ <WH4751> thereof as a bitter

הִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> Behold יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> Behold the days בָּאִ֗ים <WH935> come נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD וְהִשְׁלַחְתִּ֥י <WH7971> that I will send רָעָ֖ב <WH7458> a famine בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the land לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Not רָעָ֤ב <WH7458> not a famine לַלֶּ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> of bread וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> or צָמָ֣א <WH6772> nor a thirst לַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> for water כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> for לִשְׁמֹ֔עַ <WH8085> but of hearing אֵ֖ת <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> the words יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְנָעוּ֙ <WH5128> And they shall wander מִיָּ֣ם <WH3220> from sea עַד־ <WH5704> against יָ֔ם <WH3220> to sea וּמִצָּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> and from the north וְעַד־ <WH5704> even מִזְרָ֑ח <WH4217> even to the east יְשֽׁוֹטְט֛וּ <WH7751> they shall run to and fro לְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> to seek אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> they will not יִמְצָֽאוּ׃ <WH4672> and shall not find

בַּיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֜וּא <WH1931> he תִּ֠תְעַלַּפְנָה <WH5968> faint הַבְּתוּלֹ֧ת <WH1330> virgins הַיָּפ֛וֹת <WH3303> shall the fair וְהַבַּחוּרִ֖ים <WH970> and young men בַּצָּמָֽא׃ <WH6772> for thirst

הַנִּשְׁבָּעִים֙ <WH7650> They that swear בְּאַשְׁמַ֣ת <WH819> by the sin שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria וְאָמְר֗וּ <WH559> and say חֵ֤י <WH2416> liveth אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> Thy god דָּ֔ן <WH1835> O Dan וְחֵ֖י <WH2416> liveth דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> and The manner בְּאֵֽר־ שָׁ֑בַע <WH884> of Beersheba וְנָפְל֖וּ <WH5307> even they shall fall וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and not יָק֥וּמוּ <WH6965> and never rise up עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> again ס
